text: Ama koros Yallak kalah taqbudeeh, kah sectaah kallacta mari (ambiyaa kee meqe maraay malayka kinnuk) woo mari sinnih sinni Rabbik xayna gurrusa qibaadaa kee taaqatah kaat xayuk Raaqa mara yaaxigeenimkeh, usun kay Racmat qaagitaah kay digaalak meesita marak, usun mannal ken yaqbudeenii? diggah ku Rabbih digaala is kay naqoosa inkih kak cibbarsimtaah kak meesittam faxximta digaala kinni
